theBulwark:Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
theBulwark:Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount buffered.

theBulwark:Slipstream.NAME: Slipstream
theBulwark:Slipstream.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0 cost card draw !M! card.

theBulwark:TitanForm.NAME: Titan Form
theBulwark:TitanForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn gain !M! Plated Armour.

theBulwark:BlockChain_C.NAME: Block Chain
theBulwark:BlockChain_C.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL thebulwark:Recursive. NL Exhaust.

theBulwark:PowerDrain.NAME: Power Drain
theBulwark:PowerDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL thebulwark:Buffer !M!. NL Next turn, gain [E].

theBulwark:Pressurise.NAME: Pressurise
theBulwark:Pressurise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust

theBulwark:SeizeAdvantage.NAME: Seize Advantage
theBulwark:SeizeAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn lose !M! Dexterity.

theBulwark:DeceleratingAssault.NAME: Decelerating Assault
theBulwark:DeceleratingAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Lose 1 Strength this turn. NL thebulwark:Recursive.

theBulwark:DeceleratingAssault_C.NAME: Decelerating Assault
theBulwark:DeceleratingAssault_C.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Strength this turn. NL thebulwark:Recursive. NL Exhaust.

theBulwark:VagueSwipe.NAME: Vague Swipe
theBulwark:VagueSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL thebulwark:Threshold.

theBulwark:ElectrifiedShield.NAME: Electrified Shield
theBulwark:ElectrifiedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn apply !M! thebulwark:Shock to the attacker.

theBulwark:Brace.NAME: Brace
theBulwark:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card for each 5 damage stored in the Kinetic Buffer
theBulwark:Brace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards for each 5 damage stored in the Kinetic Buffer

theBulwark:ArmouredShove.NAME: Armoured Shove
theBulwark:ArmouredShove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

theBulwark:MomentsPeace.NAME: Moments Peace
theBulwark:MomentsPeace.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the damage buffered. Then thebulwark:Cleanse all buffered damage.

theBulwark:NanobotCoating.NAME: Nanobot Coating
theBulwark:NanobotCoating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thebulwark:Buffer Damage gain !M! Regenerate.

theBulwark:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theBulwark:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theBulwark:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theBulwark:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theBulwark:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theBulwark:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theBulwark:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theBulwark:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theBulwark:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theBulwark:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theBulwark:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
